body:
Thought I would make an AMA again cause 
1) am Mod now, maybe more people are interested in knowing me now xd
2) I like AMAs
3) I like to annoy Iron

So Ask me anything !

@poker When I was younger, I heard the name zero in some tv show and though it was really cool.I did not know it was a number in english back then but kinda sticked to it.9178 are random numbers that it recommended me Ehen creating the account cause zero was taken

@Porkyy
Sachertorte
Mostly EDM, but I also like alot oft Metal and some classic (Brahms)

@Pal First met her 2years ago in old old BC, then later in TGC/Apollo we started talkimg to each other and got besties yeay
Hasta la vista

@zeusy pegasus sounds cooler
In for cat protection !

@iScaglia
I like curry sausage,pizza,sushi and kebap
Markus

replies.body: Opinions?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions?

replies.body: I think you are a very nice person. You might be getting picked on quite alot which I think is very mean, but you are taking it like a champ. You have improved alot in alot of aspects aswell,including pvp. One thing where I might be wrong, but that I have only noticed through observations, is that you shouldn't act mature to proof yourself to others.

Hmm Probably interacting with the community more. 

I think the two things I have to improve on the most are leadership and how I talk with other users. I think I am lacking a bit in those aspects and could definitely improve
